words.def: a small vehicle with four wheels in which a baby or child is pushed around
an inclined surface connecting two levels
a diagrammatic representation of the earth's surface (or part of it)
the basic unit of electric current adopted under the Systeme International d'Unites
The jack of clubs in loo played with hands of 5 cards.
the month following February and preceding April
(golf) the standard number of strokes set for each hole on a golf course, or for the entire course
the most common computer memory which can be used by programs to perform necessary tasks while the computer is on
a reproach for some lapse or misdeed
an informal term for a father
a colorless and odorless inert gas
